website_summaries.verdict: High quality materials ensure perfect popovers every time.
pros: Truly non-stick pan produces crispy popovers that pop right out
Pan is durable, heavy, and dishwasher safe
Deep cups produce extra large popovers
Pans are stackable, should you be buying more than one
Dark metal material absorbs heat quickly
cons: The dishwasher does affect the non-stick ability of the pan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Pans!
customer_reviews.text: These pans cannot be beat for the price! Professional chefs use ratios rather than recipes as ratios are easy to memorize. The ratio for Popovers is 2:1:1 liquid to eggs to flour (by weight, not volume). Add salt nd whatever you want (herbs, Parmesan, etc.) to the ratio. Start with smoking hot cups (400-degrees) and fill about 2/3rds full. Allow the batter to rest 30-minutes (or overnight) to hydrate the flour thoroughly. Reduce heat to 350-degrees after about 15-minutes, cut a slip on top of each to dry out the interior. That's it!
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ron

customer_reviews.title: Best popover pans I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These popover pans are fabulous. No longer do I grease the pans. The popovers slide out seamlessly, carrying a lovely finishing sheen on the "crust." Dare I admit it, I don't even wash the pans when I'm done! They are that good. I have been cooking popovers for 38 years, using this recipe: 2 cups milk 2 cups floor 4 eggs 1 tsp. salt Beat just till mixed and lumps gone. Fill pans 2/3-3/4 full. cook at 450 till popped; then turn down to 375 till brown. NEVER open the oven door while baking. Thin out if at all needed so the consistency of the batter is like coffee cream.
customer_reviews.author: Slope Biker

customer_reviews.title: Great popover pan
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan for the first time yesterday. The popovers turned out high and fluffy. The recipe I used said to lightly grease the hollows before pouring in the batter. Somehow, I forgot this until after I poured. Oh crap!! I put them in the oven anyway and hoped for the best. By some miracle, after a minute of cooling, the popovers left the pan as soon as I tipped it onto the cooling rack. Easy clean up. Thank you for a fantastic product, Bellamain!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Hasnt impressed me yet but Im hoping it will
customer_reviews.text: Quality of pan is great. Heavy duty with a nice non-stick surface. The cups are big and very deep. I had to find a recipe for giant popovers using 6 eggs just to accommodate the pan. Despite each cup being 3/4 full, the pan being preheated and the batter rising well over the top of each cup, they didnt come out in the normal popover shape but more of a tube shape that leaned over at the top which was disappointing. Ive made plenty of popovers and I hate to say it but Ive had better luck with large muffin pans. Guess I'll try another recipe and see if I have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Winchester2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had never made popovers before, and this pan made it super easy. Although I did grease the hot pan before pouring in the batter, with clarified butter the first time and with bacon grease the second time, I'm not sure it was even needed. My popovers rose to double the height of the cups, browned perfectly, and I was able to just pluck the finished popovers out with my hands. No sticking whatsoever. Both times I cleaned the pan in the dishwasher, but it would've been trivial to do it by hand. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but defect
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my popover pan...however, after one use, the pan warped. I've never had this happen with any type of cookware/bakeware that I've owned -- even some of the cheaper products that I've purchased. Bellemain was highly recommended in my search for a great popover pan. I'm not sure what happened. As a chef of many years, I know how to care for cookware, so it is a bit saddening that this has happened. It definitely wasn't due to misuse.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Popovers bake perfectly in this inexpensive pan!
customer_reviews.text: Forget about those heavy and expensive popover pans. This one from Bellmain, a small family-run business, works really well and will deliver perfect fully- popped popovers every time. Furthermore, it’s non-stick easy to clean with just a sponge and some liquid detergent. The price is an extremely good value, given that some fancy pans cost as much as $35 and work half as well. I just ordered a second pan for the holidays because my dinner guests just can’t get enough of my popovers!
customer_reviews.author: Franc Martarella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan - excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This pan is exactly as advertised. It is non-stick (I do still use a tsp of melted butter or fat brushed on the inside of each cup) and is made of a sturdy metal that can withstand dropping and banging with ease. It made high popovers with a crispy golden brown exterior and a soft creamy interior. The space inside is perfect to hold butter or to fill with your choice of fillings. I like mine with butter and/or jam but I also fill them with fruit compote or scrambled egg for a brunch dish. Excellent pan - excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerit A. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Just the best Popovers!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a quest for the biggest, best popover..... I love to cook and this was my project. After reading many reviews on various popover pans I chose the "Bellemain 6 Cup Nonstick Pan". Compared to past efforts, I couldn't believe my eyes when I opened the oven the first time using this pan. The pan is very well made and the popovers simply fell out with no sticking (a problem I always had with other pans). I've now purchased 2 more of these for other family members. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This pan made baking popover so easy. The cups are well spaced so that the popovers won't run into each other and being hooked together prevents tipping and dumping the batter when you're putting the pan in the oven. The popovers came right out without sticking and the pan was very easy to clean. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: daisycb

customer_reviews.title: Makes Pop overs
customer_reviews.text: Well I love this popover restaurant in NY. It only serves po overs and they are varried and wonderful. So I decided to try my hand at it...a couple years later. The popover pan came, I found a "never fail" popover recipie and they came out wonderful. The next five batches came out like hockey pucks. Finally decided that the oven, not the cook, was at fault and now I have a 3-0 run going. Like the pan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for making tall breads and muffins.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid product that I've used quite a few times. The construction isn't all that special, but it's a solid piece. Definitely advisable to put a sheet pan under it while baking to prevent messes from spilling out. I used it for chocolate chip muffins recently, and it worked out great! Absolutely NO STICKING, and all the muffins were perfectly baked, browned, and subsequently consumed. The only hang up is the wire-on-cup design that can make it kind of a pain to clean, because there is no way to comfortably hold it, and the crevices created are inconvenient traps for crumbs and what-else.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Bulbasaur

customer_reviews.title: The pan is great, the size and shape are perfect
customer_reviews.text: The pan is great, the size and shape are perfect. I added slightly less batter then the recipe I used called for so they would be a bit fluffier on the inside and crispier on the outside. The only wish I have is that it was 12 instead of 6, and if it were ceramic nonstick. I really hate using traditional nonstick products, in fact this is the only traditional nonstick coated pan I own (having gotten rid of all of them years ago, replacing all with stainless steel, ceramic nonstick, and cast iron), other then that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BellaBabyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great Popover pans.
customer_reviews.text: Used these pans a couple of days ago and the popovers came out wonderful. Would like to mention that if you live in high elevation add 2 tbl of. additional floor to batter. I use that formula on all of my baking. Living in the Sierra Mountains it's a must. Oh by the way made Chocolate popovers and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE POPOVER PANS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE POPOVER PANS! I have now ordered 3 of them because I made popovers for Thanksgiving (easy peasy recipe) and they went like hotcakes!!! Everyone LOVED THEM! I will make them again at Christmas and use suet in the bottom to make Yorkshire Pudding popovers!!!!! They are so easy to use and the popovers POP right out after baking!!!!! Saw this popover pan on Giada DeLaurentis's Cooking Show! I would love to find a place to get recipes other than the one she demonstrated to utilize it!!! I would love to get a recipe other than the one used on her show!
customer_reviews.author: Louann B. Eadie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a couple of these for ourselves some time ago. We like them so much that we recently purchased a set for some friends who like popovers as well. Very well designed and made. They are supposed to be non-stick but we have found that you must use a little spray to make them easier to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and makes great popovers
customer_reviews.text: Great popover pan. I've used it several times since I've purchased it. It's amazing and the popovers come out so good. I will definitely recommend this pan. I've lived in England for years and the Yorkshire pudding aka popovers, come out exactly the same. Love it! Great for teatime and brunch or breakfast. Your family and friends will be so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyplace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, no stick
customer_reviews.text: The popover pan worked great. Although there were no instructions on whether you were supposed to grease the pan or not, it worked fine without greasing. Very easy to clean. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate..buy this pan for fabulous popovers!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this pan is fabulous. My popovers are magnificent. One caveat..I do use Craig Claiborne's method: start them in a cold oven and turn to 400 degrees. I bought it because the last batch I made stuck badly to the glass custard cups I was using and I had to dig them out. These practically popped out of the pan by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Great pan, good price
customer_reviews.text: I have a popular name brand mini popover pan, I decided that I would like to have a traditional size popover pan also. I decided to give Bellemain a try in part because of the price. I am not disappointed. In fact, side by side I would not be able to tell the brands apart other than in size. This is a very nice pan and it makes beautiful popovers.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Ella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Popovers
customer_reviews.text: This is my first popover pan . I selected this brand after reading several customer reviews. I’ve used the pan three times this holiday season and I am very pleased. Not only do the popovers rise and brown nicely they easily release. The pan is also very easy to clean. I think this pan will last me a long, long time. Glad I bought 2 so I can make 12 at a time!
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic popover pan
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic popover pan! I bought this to replace an old popover pan that was peeling. The popovers rose so beautifully in these and did not stick. My only note is to be very careful when taking them out of the oven as the wire between the cups is hard to get a hold of.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Popover Pan works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves popovers, so we decided to try to make them at home. It worked! They popped! The pan is great and so easy to use. This is actually our second pan. I would highly recommend washing your popover pan by hand. I think too many trips in the dishwasher started to take away the "nonstick" properties and, after a time, my popovers did not rise as high and started to stick. I learned my lesson - only washing by hand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We were having out of town family visit for several days so I wanted to make a special breakfast. I found this pan on Amazon, got it the next day. It made pop overs that popped high, were delicious and everyone loved them. The pan was also easy to clean after.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and made well!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pan! I made popovers for the first time and ordered the Bellemain 6 cups nonstick Popover Pan. I was not disappointed, the pan was easy to take the Popovers out of the Pan. The Pan was easy to clean. My only mistake was not getting 2, sine I was making 12 popovers. Will order another one
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: perfect popover pan
customer_reviews.text: Took me several times to get popovers to work, but these pans are excellent and I haven't had any problems with them. Now I just have some oil in the bottom when heating them up, pour in my batter and bake 30 mins. Wipe clean, no need to wash.
customer_reviews.author: David G Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great pop over pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is exactly what you need when you catch the Pop over episode of good eats. On minute Alton is talking using a blender and the next this pan is being ordered on amazon. Sturdy like a tank and non stick. Now I just have to stop making these things for every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Cancelmo

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick...really and reasonably priced!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 popover pans from a high- end department store years ago. They worked twice, I believe. Why I held on to them, I'll never know. I think they were very expensive. I finally threw them out and bought these. So far, so good. They don't seem to stick like my other pans, and I would grease them up!! Plus the new ones are reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: J. Overbeck

customer_reviews.title: Finally success!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent my whole life tryig to make popovers in muffin pans and custard cups and can tell you it just doesn't work well. Finally I ordered the Bellemain 6 Cup Nonstick Popover Pan and got glorious big puffy popoves using the recipe in. I pierced each popover with a skewer 10 minutes before they were due to come out of the oven and again when I set them on the rack to cool. This really helps them not to collapse. The cupss washed up easily afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Pageturner

customer_reviews.title: Great Popover Pans!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is awesome. We received them a few days ago and we put them to the test right away. Popovers were amazing. The spacing of the cups let's them grow tall and brown evenly around and the non stick matrial means we just turn them over and out they come. Best of all was the price. I've been looking in the mall and everyone seemed to have them but for an outrageous price per pan! I was able to get two pans for the same price. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous pan for Popovers
customer_reviews.text: I have several sets because what household would make just 6 at a time? They are truly non-stick, have a generous cup size and make the perfect popovers! No rusting, easy to clean, sturdy construction. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Buy one now!!! Better yet, buy two!!
customer_reviews.text: Alright, this popover pan is amazing! Exceptional quality, price, and easy to clean. My popovers turned out so delicious. I purchased one to “test” it, I’ll be ordering another as soon as I’m done typing this review. Don’t hesitate purchasing it, you’ll love it, and everyone will be begging you to make more and more and more...
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Popovers
customer_reviews.text: The popover pan is wonderful. Easy to use. My first batch didn't turn out great. But that was the Baker not the pan. Batch 2 is what the pic is from. Thanks to my great pan. So much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick pans
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered popovers after they have been around for years. I purchased two of these pans, they are truly nonstick. There is no need to spray with nonstick spray. Just coat with butter and the popovers slid right out. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Works great with King Arthur flour (KAF) Gluten Free (GF) popovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to make the KAF GF popover recipe on their website. Having made a few batches, they come out fantastic and pop every time -- you would never even know they were GF if I didn't tell you!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I saw a recipe for Popovers that I wanted to try but I did not have a Popover Pan. I started looking around and realized that a lot of stores do not carry them. I decided to look on Amazon and found exactly what I was looking for. They are sturdy, with a medium to heavy weight (which is what I was looking for). Easy clean up because they are nonstick. I received them in a reasonable amount of time (considering the Pandemic). I am very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Better than another brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Chicago Metallic pan that I had been using. Although I was careful, the coating was flaking off. So far, I'm really pleased with the quality and heft of this Bellemain pan. Popovers are such a treat, I want to ensure that they have everything they need to really pop!
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: So easy to remove the popovers!
customer_reviews.text: The truly amazing thing about this is that the popovers actually pop up and out of the cups, so it is nothing to remove them, even with no oil. I always hesitate to buy a uni-tasker, but this is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ichiji

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The pans came much earlier than promised so I was pleasantly surprised. I ordered 2 pans because seriously why just put 6 popovers in the oven when you can make 12??? I have not made them yet but the pans are really quite substantial and look like excellent quality. I was very happy that they nested nicely since storage space in my kitchen is limited. Now I am really ready to make the popovers. I think I am going to make cinnamon sugar ones first...12 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A perfect popover pan!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my new popover pan! My very old “rubber” pan finally disintegrated. This one does not flex on the stove grate; it is so easy to clean and the popovers are perfect! I’m making corn muffins in it tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Martha B.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a popover pan that doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: I've been making popovers for years, using different types of pans, buttering and dusting them with flour, but they've always stuck! This pan did not stick! The popovers came out easily and were a nice height. The pan isn't as wide as a custard cup, so the popovers are narrower, but the fact that I didn't have to try to pry the popovers out with a knife made the width size unimportant.
customer_reviews.author: Janis B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a heavy duty, truly nonstick pan ...
customer_reviews.text: ... but I think you have to use oil anyway to make successful popovers. It may not be absolutely necessary but mine came out better when I pre-heated the pan and sprayed in some oil. The pan is wonderful, learning to make popovers like I had and the Jordan Pond teahouse (Acadia Nat'l Park, Mount Desert Island, ME) is a challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne the Shrink

customer_reviews.title: Just like back home
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with the Bellemain 6 cup Nonstick Popover Pan. I had been searching for the perfect "pan" so that I could make popovers like my grandmother used to make for me back in Maine. Imagine this, if you will..the wondrous smell of these culinary delights emanating from the kitchen and knowing that in just a little while, you would be able to enjoy the warm buttery taste of a popover. The pan is a delight and takes very little cleanup. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great Popovers
customer_reviews.text: My Popovers were never this big and high. They came out so large. Great pan. I only wish I had 2 but I live alone and don't need to make a bigger batch. These pans are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect popovers
customer_reviews.text: We'd been talking about nostalgic foods and popovers came right up, so had to try them. Using muffin pans was a disappointment to say the least, so I bought this nonstick popover pan. What a difference it made--the pan itself is well-made, sturdy and it did it's job! The popovers rose high and they slid right out of the pan without sticking at all. Now that they weather is turning cooler, and we have the right 'tool', we'll be enjoying nice, steamy, buttery popovers frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and sent them to family. I was visiting and wanted to make popovers. The pans are sturdy and the non stick features works well. I would definitely by again.
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! Great construction! Very sturdy! Would reorder or recommend y to friends! Can’t wait to try it! Came quicker than projected!
customer_reviews.author: Moosekiss

customer_reviews.title: Best popover pan.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan for making my popovers. Easy to clean, very sturdy and the price was very reasonable. Will definitely purchase a second one since my family loves popovers.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This popover pan really is non-stick!
customer_reviews.text: This popover pan replaces one that made popovers look more like muffins. The Bellemain pan produces large popovers that are tall and crispy on the outside. I'm very pleased with this purchase and recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Allen

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and cleaning; beauty of popovers it delivers.
customer_reviews.text: I am now the proud owner of a Bellemain 6 cup popover pan. It is a beauty which has been on my list of “wish I had this in my kitchen” for quite some time. It baked my first popovers—garlic parmesan—in record time and did they ever rise and brown beautifully. I am so happy to own this product!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S Holzborn

customer_reviews.title: Best popover pan Amazon sells
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, outstanding product, would order again. Everything the Chicago Metallic Professional 6-cup popover pan does except, the warranty, for $14 less.
customer_reviews.author: VetintheWest

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous popover pan!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I would have to say I like everything about this popover pan. My popovers came out the best I’ve ever made. I’m seriously thinking of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Grace E. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It really works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a dandy popover pan and at the right price. It's nonstick (hurray!!), has a nice flared lip to catch spills and costs less than 20 bucks. You can't beat that with a stick. My popovers didn't just pop over, they popped out when I removed them from the oven. C'est magnifique!! Don't waste your money on a $40 heavy pan. Get this one....or two if you have a big family.
customer_reviews.author: June C. Zettelmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Go get one or two or three!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. I didn't get why the wife need this since we have muffin pans. After she used it the first time, I got it. The thing was awesome, I raised up like a volcano like it was going to erupt. Best popover I had by far. Pan is well made, feel solid. Buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: Miccalob Light

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: A great substitute to the Jordan Pond Branded popover pan I was contemplating buying in Bar Harbor for a better price. Support small business and buy american!
customer_reviews.author: daniel c mack

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Our popovers came out of the pan very easily and were cooked perfectly in the recommended time frame. This is my 2nd order for this pan since the first one worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Popover Pan - great tool to create something unique for your family and friends
customer_reviews.text: The Popover Pan is easy to use and great for an easy clean up. I haven't figured out how to get my popovers to rise consistently with the new pan - been told that there is a little bit of a process to getting your popovers to all look the same.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed popover baking pan
customer_reviews.text: We used this to make our first batch of popovers with our own pan. The pan was very well made, sturdy and easy to clean. We liked using this pan better than the one we had borrowed from a friend. I highly recommend this pan to anyone who is looking for one of their own
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: The teflon is coming up on bottom of cups.
customer_reviews.text: After maybe 6 to 7 uses the teflon in the bottom of cups is coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: Only nonstick for a precious few months
customer_reviews.text: We've had this pan for four months and used it weekly at most for breakfast popovers. At first it worked like magic and I couldn't believe I'd waited so long to replace our original pan. Four months later (after mostly hand washing, but a couple of runs through the dishwasher) it behaves like it was never nonstick. I have to wrench out each popover with a butterknife, and I do use spray oil and butter with every single batch. It has also become very hard to clean and even lots of scrubbing with the rough side of the sponge will not remove the baked on crust.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent popover cups
customer_reviews.text: The popover cups were excellent. They are very solid and the non-stick coating was truly non-stick. The item arrived promptly and as advertised on the Amazon page
customer_reviews.author: Sports Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bellemain Popover Pan!  The best!
customer_reviews.text: We used ours over Thanksgiving! We've had others! But, this far surpassed any brand we have used! Don't hesitate to purchase Bellemain Popover Pan
customer_reviews.author: Vera Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: works like a dream!! I even messed up the recipe.........originally forgot to add the flour. Remembered about 2 minutes after putting it in the oven. Took it our and decided to put in a little flour in each cup stirred it in and put it back in the oven. This was even a sourdough recipe from King Arthur!! and it came out huge, beautiful and delicious. WOW. Could not believe it. They just popped out very easy and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I read reviews. Do not put in dishwasher was the biggest comment. I hand washed and used right away. Very first batch turned out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used them to make the "Neiman Marcus" popovers and they came out like a charm. (Recipe in Pinterest). Clean up (hand wash) was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Botha

customer_reviews.title: The is the best popover pan.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE popover pan to use. All the others. and I have tried at least 4 of them, produce less than satisfactory results. Martha Stewart's recipe and detailed instructions are also the best. If followed religiously, you will get huge popovers.
customer_reviews.author: MadMax

customer_reviews.title: I hit the ground running with this bad boy. I made popovers twice in the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I hit the ground running with this bad boy. I made popovers twice in the first two days of ownership and holy moly were they fantastic. The pan cleans up beautifully and has a good, solid feel. I would recommend this product to anyone who was looking to dabble in popovers. I would also check out the popover recipe from King Arthur Flour as they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Tilburg

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment if you are serous about baking
customer_reviews.text: This is a study pan with great non stick surfaces. I used it after a quick wash in soapy water and I used some butter spray on each cup. My popovers rose to about double the pan depth, light and evenly cooked. I'm really happy with the results and will use this pan often.
customer_reviews.author: Maire

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Made some excellent popovers from this. I grease the cups before use anyway and popovers come right out. We're trying to meet the standard set by Jordan Pond Restaurant in Acadia National Park, and aren't there yet ... but this is helping!
customer_reviews.author: Martin W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect popovers, perfect pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy construction, super easy to clean, even browning. Price was also right, especially in comparison to similar pans offered elsewhere. Totally love this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Evals

customer_reviews.title: Best popover product EVER
customer_reviews.text: This was an EXCELLENT product.....the popover pan is heavy, sturdy and super easy to clean. I am more than happy with my purchase and I am happy that I waited so long to purchase one as now I have THIS one which I truly love !! P.s. my popovers turn out wonderful...much better than using a muffin tin which is .....COR MUFFINS !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerjulie

customer_reviews.title: Cup fell off
customer_reviews.text: We like this pan very much. Popovers come out easily, cleans easily. But after 4 months one of the cups fell off. Weld didn't hold.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Best Popover Pans
customer_reviews.text: This is the best type of pan for baking popovers. I’ve tried others, but you need this wire type, heavy duty pan. I have 3 if these pans. The poppers are hugh and tasty using these pans. I highly recommend these pans- buy 2 or more- it makes it much faster when you have company.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: !makes popovers easy to bake!
customer_reviews.text: Out family loves popovers and this pan does a great job of making them. Bought this as a requested gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy 😋
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Well made. Haven't had a poopy popover yet! They all come out golden brown and delicious. This pan is sure to become a family heirloom!
customer_reviews.author: Fairnuff

customer_reviews.title: Soldering separated after first use!!
customer_reviews.text: This pan worked great at first for my popovers and it certainly is non stick but the soldering seam on one of the cups separated after the first use in the over :( I'm not happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pop over pan with a gift card to Amazon. Wow!!! Used Kenji's recipe for Yorkshire puddings. I sat in front of the stove and just watch those things rise!! These were the best puddings I ever made, all do to this pan. Next time, I'll follow Chef Ron's review and cut a slit in the top so they rise even higher
customer_reviews.author: Jeff I.

customer_reviews.title: He seems very happy with the gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a wedding gift for my son, who made popovers in my vintage cast iron popover pan for years. He seems very happy with the gift. I may be able to say more once he has used it. Meanwhile, it seems well-made and like it will work well. My only disappointment is that it only makes 6, as opposed to my vintage pan which makes 11, although they are a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite treats was popovers
customer_reviews.text: As a child, one of my favorite treats was popovers. I am now 70 years old and recently tried to make some popovers in custard cups which were a complete failure even though I followed the recipe in our old cookbook carefully. So, I ordered these popover pans and tried again. These popovers were perfect! They rose very high and did not stick at all. I will be making popovers for my grand children when they visit in a few days. A very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly right to bake popovers like we had at Anthony's Pier Four yrs ago.
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than using large cupcake tins. The centers come out better with the smallish cups. NICE
customer_reviews.author: D. Liebig

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pan. I have tried all sorts of different pans to try to make popovers and had no luck until I purchased this pan. The popovers bake just as they should and slide right out. My brother who is a fabulous cook and is always trying new things could not believe how nice this pan worked when he borrowed it from me. He has since ordered one. All I can say is that it is all good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Buying another one...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this popover pan for a while now and it has been key in making fabulous popovers! I just bought a second one to give to my daughter for her new home - she loves our popovers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the popover pan yet. But it looks just like the one I ordered before and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Evenly bakes and easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.text: Macy’s has closed their nearby restaurant where popovers were served at every meal. I wanted to have my own popover pan to try to duplicate the Macy’s delicacy. Thank you for producing a product that is a reasonable Price point and good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: awesome pans!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews here, I decided on these pans. I had never made pop-overs before but I am now a convert! They were big and fluffy, and a total hit with family and guests. I use the Martha Stewart recipe (2 1/2 cups of whole milk, 2 1/2 cup flour, salt, and 6 eggs) which is perfect for 12 pop-overs. Get at least 2 pans , it's worth it. And they reheat very well!
customer_reviews.author: gogo pilot

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: I tried them out this morning. What a difference from years of muffin tin use. The popovers were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Popovers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect popover pan! I used a recipe that I located on line and the popovers are perfect! I'll be ordering another soon for a gift! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Produces great results
customer_reviews.text: This pan is wonderful. It was easy to clean and made great turnovers. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. G. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Beats the cast iron pans, give it a try
customer_reviews.text: I have been a diehard cast iron popover pan user for almost 40 years but this pan has converted me. Giant fluffy popovers with no weird inside deflated ones.
customer_reviews.author: OneQTpieAMi

customer_reviews.title: You can Pop Me Up with this pan!
customer_reviews.text: A local restaurant always served popup rolls so during the pandemic my daughters craved popup, I went online and honestly read a few reviews about your popup pan and ordered it. Made three batches in a row, my daughters and I were static’s , not only for the rolls but how magnificent the pan worked! Easy to cook with easy to clean, easy to store. I may buy a second so I can make a dozen at a time !
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DeBella

customer_reviews.title: This popover pan works great and the popovers slide right out.
customer_reviews.text: This pan makes the perfect popovers. My husband keeps asking me to make them for him and they are gone in a day. The consistency and browning in this pan is perfect. I was making them in a muffin tin which got the job done, but did not hold the shape, over browned on the top, and did not have the same dramatic effect as this pan.
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: Making popovers is easy!
customer_reviews.text: I had never made popovers before, but they came out perfectly the very first time! Beautifully brown, high and puffy, and easily removed from the pan. Nonstick coating made cleanup a snap. I simply put the pan in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Popovers popped right out!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try making popovers for awhile. Decided to finally purchase the pan and madedelicious popovers. They popped right out and everyone enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent, didn’t really know what to expect so I am very happy- but wish I had purchased a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Popover Pan
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Popovers just fall out when pan tilted. This is an excellent popover pan.
customer_reviews.author: ragweed

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything else.
customer_reviews.text: These make the best popovers. Bought for my daughter and she loves them. Well worth the money - bought two, just in case we have company.
customer_reviews.author: Rhondda Colombatto

customer_reviews.title: Awsome pan
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this pan. Popovers came out perfect and it cleans up easy.
customer_reviews.author: CottonLover

customer_reviews.title: Makes the most beautiful popovers!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the popovers this created. Wish I would have gotten the 12 instead of the 6. I used the Neiman Marcus popover recipe and they were a big hit. Left overs were great for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Popovers anyone?
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using less batter makes them so light! Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. T. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: More than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: These pans are FANTASTIC! I already had a set, but it has been in storage for many years now, and I just couldnt bare the thought of having to rummage through storage to find it. So, I decided to find one online. Not wanting to pay too much for one since I already had, I found this gem. Great price, as well as a great product!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dukes

product_meta.title: Bellemain 6 Cup Nonstick Popover Pan
product_meta.description:
If you've been disappointed with the flat, heavy popovers and Yorkshire puddings you get using regular muffin pans, it's not your fault; it's your pan's. Discover the difference the Bellemain Popover Pan can give you in achieving dramatically better results with minimum effort. 

2.25"D Cups Promote Rising
The best popovers are those that rise high, staying light and tender inside. You simply can't get that effect with a muffin pan whose cups are only an inch or so deep. The Bellemain's cups are twice as deep, which allows popovers to climb up to impressive heights. 

Nonstick Finish for Easy Food Release
With no sticking to the bottom or sides, popovers slide out in one easy piece. (Of course, you will still want to use the melted butter your recipe calls for to give your popovers their delicious taste and crispy surface.) Cleanup is a breeze as well; in fact, you can put the pan straight into the dishwasher. 

Durable, Welded Metal
Count on the Bellemain's rugged construction for years of trouble-free use. The dark colored metal also absorbs heat faster, which is ideal for the high temperature, short baking time that produces perfect popovers.
feature_bullets: Vertical cups (2.25"D x 3" diameter) for maximum rise
Nonstick finish lets popovers slide right out
